storyInfo: Lateran troops under Oren's command are about to storm the abbey. The Sarkaz inside learn of it.

attributes.content: There's no sign of fighting inside the house. The children are still sleeping.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Hyman wouldn't harm the kids. You can be sure of that.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Not yet.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I don't know how long she can maintain her reason.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: How do you intend to tell the kids about Hyman when they wake up?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: They have a right to know.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Sometimes, ignorance is bliss.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Is that a suggestion?
attributes.name: Federico
Gerald
attributes.content: No, Federico...

attributes.name: Gerald
attributes.content: I hope you don't mind me calling you that.
It was you who spared Hyman. It was you who earned the children's trust. The choice is yours.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Feeling the weight?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I'm not wearing any extra weights.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I'll take that as your personal brand of humor.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: What are you looking at?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Do you know what this is?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: A piece of cloth... we stuff like that to make blankets for winter, but I've never seen this pattern before.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: It's a common Lateran pattern.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Underneath the cloth, the twins' breathing is long and steady.
The Executor looks at it for a while, then turns his gaze to the simple desk beside.
There is a small clay jar on it.
Other than the children, the flower in the jar, not yet fully wilted, provides the only color in the room.
A flower? It's pretty dried-up. Must have been there for at least two days.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Is this Hyman's hobby?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I... I don't know.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I thought I knew the people who follow me. But I'm not even sure...
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I must return to the sacrarium.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I have enough information to pass judgment on the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: And what is your judgment?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: First, there is something I must know—have you had any interaction with Oren Argiolas?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Oren the nuncio?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Not much. He went missing soon after he arrived.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You call yourself Gerald, but that is not your real name.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Who can say if a name is real or not? I've used it for ten years.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I've been Gerald the Hunter ever since we started living here and built our first house with those broken planks.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: How you identify is none of my concern. You can be Gerald.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Then—
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: A strange sense of urgency causes the words fall from the tongue.
Federico does not give him time to speak.
He says the name that has not been spoken in public for ten years.

A mercenary who made his name in the Kazdel Civil War, wanted by the Notarial Hall, thirty-two confirmed crimes on his record, responsible for annihilating three of the Holy Lateran's Executor Maniples.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Holst Tyfindale.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You knew...
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Yes, I knew. What I can find out, others can too.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: This is your final warning—
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Your identity is no longer a secret, Gerald.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Target structure confirmed.
attributes.name: Veteran Lateran Commando

attributes.content: Hard to believe the Sarkaz would really want to live in an abbey of ours.
attributes.name: Veteran Lateran Commando

attributes.content: Ready to move in?
attributes.name: Young Lateran Commando

attributes.content: No rush. We'll wait for the order.
attributes.name: Veteran Lateran Commando

attributes.content: Let's wait and see. We have the area surrounded.
attributes.name: Veteran Lateran Commando

attributes.content: Same as that Sarkaz team we nabbed earlier...
attributes.name: Veteran Lateran Commando

attributes.content: Not a single one of them is getting away.
attributes.name: Veteran Lateran Commando

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Young Lateran Commando

attributes.content: I got some food. It's not much, but it's better than nothing.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Sorry, Serpilia... I'm not hungry...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Well, I'll leave it here. You might start to feel hungry in a bit.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Gratias, Serpilia...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: What for?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Nothing in particular... I just wanted to thank you.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Eat up and go to bed if you really want to thank me. I get off earlier that way.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: R-Really? Then I'll go to sleep...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Sorry, I can't sleep...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I figured.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Are you sure you should be here? I'm feeling much better now... what I mean is... you don't have to stay with me if you don't want to.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Watching you is my job, girl. I'm not exactly a saint.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I won't run away.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Who knows? The better a girl behaves, the more you have to keep an eye on her.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Do you know what those black horns on your head mean? Do you know what's waiting for you when you're brought back to Laterano?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I... No, I don't.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Of course you don't. You can't empath with me, can you?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Oh, don't look like that. I was just trying to scare you a little. His Holiness is pretty kind, all things considered. No need to worry too much.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I'm not worried.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Whatever punishment I receive, I deserve...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: What's that sound? Is there someone outside?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Whatever it is, it's none of your business.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Stay put. I'll check it out.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Strange. There's nobody here.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: You're really letting your guard down. It hasn't been that long.
The way you talk still makes me want to punch you.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I'm wondering how you operated in Victoria. Did you spend all your time making enemies for Laterano, Oren?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I resent that characterization. No one takes his job more seriously than me.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Speaking of job, you're ready on your side, aren't you, Serpilia?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Maybe?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I need a less ambiguous answer.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: We move at dawn, if there are no complications.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: (Strange... Serpilia hasn't come back yet?)
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: (Things seemed to have calmed down outside...)
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: (Wh-What's that sound?)
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: S-Serpilia? Is that you?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Oh! Mmph...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Shh.
attributes.name: Low Male Voice

attributes.content: It's me.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Raimund?!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Come with me, Fortuna.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Finally outside.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Why are you here, Lemuen?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: There was a bit of trouble. I ran into someone unpleasant and let him get away... it sounds even worse when I put it that way.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I came because I heard a commotion over here.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I'm surprised you would make a threat like that.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Threat?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Wasn't it?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Then what did you mean?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I was only telling the truth. Correct judgment is based on the truth of the present situation. I don't need to threaten anyone.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I think I get it...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: But there is nothing more unpredictable than people. Even we fail to understand our own thoughts sometimes, and it's not unusual for our actions and thoughts to contradict one another.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Experience tells me that things rarely develop in the most logical way.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Setting that aside... the situation is more complicated than I expected.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: We need to exchange information, Federico.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You mean the monster we saw was the missing Sarkaz by the name of Hyman?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: The state that you saw her in was different from what I saw. And if that's the case...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: She has gone from being impossible to communicate with, demonstrating no capacity for thought beyond feeding instinct, to being able to communicate in a limited manner.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Evolution.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: That is a reasonable hypothesis.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: She has undergone a transformation. During a mission, I read about a religious cult that operates on the Iberian coastline.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The Church of the Deep.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You seem to know a lot about them, Federico. Have you seen similar creatures on previous missions?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Rarely.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: But you have. That makes things easier to explain.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I had reason to read up on it a while ago... we may be working with the Iberian Inquisition concerning that cult.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: They've caught His Holiness's attention. I didn't expect to run into them here...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: It's a difficult problem.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Difficult and dangerous... I doubt I would've gotten the upper hand if that visitor was trying to do more than slow me down.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: This is irritating... I really need to get back to form. Even Serpilia will start looking down on me at this rate.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Back to the situation at hand, are you sure you should have told Gerald all that?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: He has a right to know.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Alright. What's the plan now?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Investigate.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Fires don't start on their own. Something is not right with the fire at the sacrarium.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: And the flower... No, I can't be sure yet.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: First, I need to find what caused the fire.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Sorry to wake you at this hour.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: It's okay. A lot of us couldn't sleep anyway.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: I've let everyone know. We can leave at any time.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: But didn't you say we were leaving in the morning? What changed?
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Is it because of the fire?
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: I guarantee you it wasn't Raimund who did it. We don't need to—
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: No, I don't suspect him.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Then...
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: We have a situation. I'll explain later. But we can't wait until morning.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Still no word from the team we sent out?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: No. It's strange. They might have run into trouble.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Should I take a few guys and check it out?
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: No, we'll go together. Make sure everyone sticks together. No one wanders off on their own.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I'll scout ahead. Have the old folks come with me. You take the rear guard with Raimund, alright?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Something's not alright. I can see it on your face.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: What's going on? You're anxious. Why?
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Because of the Laterans?
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Nothing gets past you.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: You're always cautious, Reed.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Stop. That's not my name anymore.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Sorry, I just...
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Gerald cannot finish his sentence.
He realizes why his old friend could tell something was wrong at a glance. He realizes he had his hand on the hilt of his dagger.
He is turning from Gerald the Hunter to the mercenary he once was.
Sorry. It felt too much like our Kazdel days.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Maybe I'm overthinking it, but I have a bad feeling about this. Call it a hunch, but we should leave as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Yes, as soon as possible. Take the ones who are ready. We go now.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Like I said, you're the boss. Your call.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: But the last time you had a hunch, it was about finding a place and having a better life.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: We'll find it. I swear.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I believe you.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: You found this place for us.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: I hope it goes smoothly.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Eileen, but I can't take you this time.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Will you blame me for it?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: What would you think if you could see this?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Who's there?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: It's me, Gerald.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Are you busy?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: There's something you should know...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Wow, that old man is intimidating, isn't he?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: This mission has gotten seriously complicated.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Sarkaz, a fallen angel, and a mad abbot... give me a break.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: And I'm here with Federico, of all people... is that a good thing or not?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Just in case...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Oren, it's me.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Are you gonna do it? You've got the guys there, right?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I suggest you look into this Bishop Stefano. Something's not right with him. It could be dangerous.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: A hunch?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Maybe... I have a bad feeling about this abbey. Well, I guess that's not the right way to put it... it's bad because things aren't that bad.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: You've been here longer than I have. Don't you feel it?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: How could there be a place where everyone works so hard, yet feels no hope at all?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: That's such a sad thing.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: So, I told Raimund about Delfina and Fortuna, not knowing that he didn't know.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: He got very worked up. I'm concerned.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Gerald...? Are you okay?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I'm fine. Don't worry.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: It's not your fault. I just didn't have the chance to tell him.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Where's Raimund?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: He ran out after asking me about Fortuna. He said he was going to get her back.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: They have Laterans guarding Fortuna. Are you sure about this?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: The Sankta won't allow it.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Raimund was born here. Things are different out there. He doesn't understand our relationship with the Sankta.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I remember, you've said that relations between the Sankta and Sarkaz are...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Bad.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: It might not have been so bad if we were all just civilians...
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Won't Raimund be in danger?!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I'll find him. Thanks for telling me.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: There isn't much I can do...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I'm beginning to think you were right, Gerald. You should leave this place.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Go now. It's the right choice. Don't... don't wait until tomorrow!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: That's the plan.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: You seem anxious, Clément... did something else happen?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I'm fine. I'm just... today has been quite a day. It's a little too much.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Go, Gerald. You were right. You shouldn't stay here.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Something's off about you, Clément. Calm down. You—
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Boss! We have a problem!
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: We went the opposite way from the scout team, as you had ordered, and we saw troops approaching the abbey!
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Troops?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Laterans! Sankta and Pontifica Cohors!
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: I fought them many times. I'd know 'em from a mile away!
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: They're going to surround us!
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: They never intended to let us go!
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Gerald draws his fingers back with a start.
A moment later, he realizes that it's because his fingertips are too cold, so cold that the leather sheath seems to be burning.
Clément.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I'm here. What do we do...?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Don't worry.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I've been running for too long. This is just putting things back the way they should be... all will be settled.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Tell us what to do, boss.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: We're prepared to fight.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Thank you for spending all these years with me, all of you.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Don't talk like that.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: What are you doing, Gerald? What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: P-Put down that knife! Calm down!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I'm perfectly calm, Clément..
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: The Sarkaz exhales, clutches the dagger, and pulls it out from its sheath.
It burns.
For an instant there, he had difficulty holding onto his old friend.
My mind has not been so clear in a decade.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: If only blood can end it all, then there's only one thing left to do.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Don't worry. The blood of Sarkaz is not shed lightly.
attributes.name: Gerald
